title: Pearhead Cactus Plant Baby Memory Book with Included Baby Belly Stickers, A Great Baby Registry Addition, Trendy Baby Gift, White / Green / Cactus
features: Pearhead Cactus 5-Year Baby Memory Book makes the perfect baby shower or registry gift for a baby boy or baby girl; includes 50-guided journal pages with space for photos, 16 belly stickers, and a 3.25" x 3.25" cover photo insert. This book also includes a folder on the inside to include baby's most precious keepsakes.

Pages include: who the book belongs to, when mom and dad saw you for the first time (in mom's belly!), a note to baby, baby's big debut, baby's prints, visitors, homecoming, the world baby came into, and baby's first keepsake

Pages also include: the family tree, baby's first 12 months, a birthday note from mom and dad, baby's favorites, baby's first words, bath, smile, doctor's appointment, friend, food, tooth, adventure, haircut, first time sitting up, crawling, standing, and first time walking
Pages also include: baby's art, 8 of baby's first holidays, 1st - 5th birthday, and baby's first day of school from pre-school to 1st grade

There's also space to include photos throughout the journal of your sonogram, baby's first picture, the family, family's home, extended family, 1- 12 months of baby's first year, baby doing his/her favorite thing, pictures of baby's firsts including their first holidays, 1st – 5th birthday, first days of school, and an extra 4 pages to put more pictures!.This cactus themed babybook is perfect for baby boy or baby girl! It's decorated in green with white and gold accents. “My baby book" is foil stamped on the front of the book, adding a too-cute touch. Gold accents around the photo insert adds a modern and stylish feel to this book. This keepsake book also includes 16 belly stickers, 1 for each month of baby's first year and 4 extras stickers for fun; including one brand new belly sticker for baby's first day!.Don't forget to add this adorable book to your baby registry. It's a great baby shower gift for anyone expecting a baby boy or baby girl!
description: "Adorable and right on trend, celebrate baby's first year with Pearhead's cactus baby's memory book and sticker set. This cute keepsake baby book is the perfect way to cherish every one of baby's moments. Keepsake photo journal style baby book includes 50-acid free pages with descriptions to fill in all the details about baby. When baby says ""momma,"" for the first time or starts to walk, capture those most precious memories in the book. For years to come, every time you open this special keepsake book every memory will bring you back to the day they happened. Each page is thoughtfully designed to include descriptions so you have an easy-to-follow guide for filling everything in. This book also includes 16 belly stickers, one for each month of baby's first year plus a few bonus stickers. Simply place the sticker on baby's belly and snap a picture. Share with everyone you love on social media and then print the picture to include in the book. The book's entire theme is too cute with mint and gold designs, making it the perfect baby shower gift for baby boy or baby girl. Adorable little cacti are printed throughout the book and add a fun touch. The cute designs are fun for baby to look at and great for decorating baby's nursery. You can even display a 3.25"" x 3.25"" photo on the front cover. Also store some of baby's most adorable keepsakes in the back of this book with the included pocket folder. After baby's first year, continue to fill the book in with memories from baby's birthday every year. The entire book is spiral bound ensuring the pages won't come loose when baby starts to play with their little book. When posting the belly sticker pictures use our hashtag #mylittlepearhead for a chance to be featured on Pearhead's pages. Never forget a moment and always cherish baby's most adorable moments with Pearhead's baby memory book and sticker set. Product dimensions: Book 10"" W x 9.4"" H x 1"" D; Stickers 4"" W x 4"" H; Cover photo insert: 3.25"" x 3.25"".

At Pearhead, we aim to create genuine, quality products to celebrate your special moments in life. We are a family of designers, marketers, and trendsetters bringing products to life that will bring a smile to your face. From concept and design to production and customer service, the Pearhead team works together seamlessly every step of the way. Whether your baby is celebrating their first year of life, you are announcing your pregnancy, or your pup is celebrating his first holiday season, Pearhead is here to share your moments in style."
